EmailTemplate.name: 12/10/2013 - New Customer Jumpstart.Follow up - No-shows
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry to have missed you at the VMTurbo Jumpstart Training
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
We were sorry to have missed you at the VMTurbo Jumpstart webcast on December 10th. But, hey, things come up, right? The good news is that we are glad to provide you with a recorded version <http://support.vmturbo.com/forums/21120432-training> of the training. Be aware that you will need to log in with your VMTurbo Support Portal credentials to view the webcast.
If you have any questions that arise as you view it, please let us know.
We look forward to bringing you more of these types of webinars in the future and would welcome comments and suggestions regarding improvements, via our short survey. <https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/F8N6DSX>
Besides the Jumpstart webinar, we also offer a wide range of additional training options <http://go.vmturbo.com/pso-training-request.html>.
We look forward to seeing you at one of our upcoming events again soon.
Sincerely, The VMTurbo Team Marketo, Inc. 901 Mariners Island Blvd., San Francisco, CA, 94404
Contact Us <#>
